Maya Tools Library
******************




Included dependencies
=====================

- Qt.py
- PIL


Library
=======

.. py:module:: customWidget

.. py:class:: CollaspedWidget

    .. py:method:: setIcon(path)
        Set an icon to the collapsed button widget

        :param string path: Icon file path

    .. py:method:: hideContent
